name: Math Mazer
description:
Welcome to Math Mazer!

Can you escape the maze? You woke up in creepy dungeon filled with all kinds of dangerous things (like broccoli!).  Your only chance of escape?  Your keen math skills. Good luck!

Choose the types of problems you'd like to try (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division) and let's begin.  Each right answer brings you closer to the exit.

Good luck! 🍀

* * *

This game is built using the Love2d framework.
All emojis designed by OpenMoji – the open-source emoji and icon project. License: CC BY-SA 4.0
